Body.Content:
On May 8, 2025, the Draft well-written input text with Copilot preview feature will have reached end of support.

How does this affect me?
After May 8, 2025, the feature will be removed, and end users will no longer be able to draft text using Copilot in canvas apps.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Apps - Information regarding the end of support for Draft well-written input text with Copilot preview feature
